rev.comment: [[Help:Reverting|Reverted]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/92.41.0.67|92.41.0.67]] ([[User talk:92.41.0.67|talk]]) to last version by Lear's Fool
rev.diff:
Line 12: Line 12:
In some societies the practice was enacted owing to a belief that the soul of an unmarried woman would not find peace; among the [[Jingpo|Kachin]] of Myanmar, versions of a marriage ceremony were held to lay a dead virgin to rest, which would involve intercourse with the corpse. Similar practices existed in some pre-modern Central European societies when a woman who was engaged to be married died before the wedding.<ref>Walker, Benjamin. ''Encyclopaedia of Metaphysical Medicine'', Routledge 1978, pp. 191-2. Walker cites Rollo Ahmed, ''The Black Art'', John Long, London, 1936, in support.</ref>
In some societies the practice was enacted owing to a belief that the soul of an unmarried woman would not find peace; among the [[Jingpo|Kachin]] of Myanmar, versions of a marriage ceremony were held to lay a dead virgin to rest, which would involve intercourse with the corpse. Similar practices existed in some pre-modern Central European societies when a woman who was engaged to be married died before the wedding.<ref>Walker, Benjamin. ''Encyclopaedia of Metaphysical Medicine'', Routledge 1978, pp. 191-2. Walker cites Rollo Ahmed, ''The Black Art'', John Long, London, 1936, in support.</ref>
â   â
Joshua Guy is a man I play games with, he told me on several occasions that he has came close and even in contact with dead corpses. I have asked him why he would pull such disturbing stunts like that and he told me never to ask him again or he would murder me and rape me whilst I was dead. After that I got worried about Josh and even come close to reporting him to the police and psychiatric units on several different occassions on which I phoned them told them about his condition and done nothing to stop him or even prevent it from happening again. I got even more worried about Josh and even went to his home a few times to see if I could get through to him to stop this happening to anyone else in the future. I will be reporting more about Josh in the future and will tell you about the progress I have made with him, if I have made any.
